sentences.en: Did you recently clean the house, mow the lawn or snuggle your new kitten?
sentences.cn: 最近你是否清扫过房屋 、 修整过草坪或依偎过小猫?

sentences.en: Do they make you want to work or do they make you snuggle and sleep?
sentences.cn: 他们是让您有工作的冲动还是使你昏昏欲睡 呢 ?

sentences.en: I love snuggle and cuddle with you.
sentences.cn: 我喜欢偎依着你、拥抱着你.

sentences.en: I take off my shoes, and I snuggle in bed.
sentences.cn: 我把我的鞋子脱下来, 然后我就在床上舒适地躺著.

sentences.en: I'd love to snuggle up in bed right now!
sentences.cn: 我 真 想立刻舒舒服服地躺到床上!

sentences.en: In love stupidly, live simply , snuggle clumsily, be together silly.
sentences.cn: 笨笨的相爱, 呆呆的过日子, 拙拙的依偎, 傻傻的在一起.

sentences.en: Jane snuggled up against his shoulder.
Just snuggle with them, focus on them, forget about the world.
sentences.cn: 仅仅和他们依偎在一起, 注视着他们, 忘掉其他.

sentences.en: Like any politician, he has to snuggle up to all sorts.
sentences.cn: 和任何政界人士一样, 奥巴马不得不迎合各类人等.

sentences.en: Nor is it OK to snuggle up behind the copier with your latest crush.
sentences.cn: 和你最新的恋人在复印件后面卿卿我我也是不合时宜的.

sentences.en: Now, snuggle right down and I'll tuck you up.
sentences.cn: 快缩到被子里去, 我来给你盖好.

sentences.en: On cold days, I like to stay home and snuggle with my girlfriend.
sentences.cn: 天气冷的时候, 我喜欢待在家,和我女朋友依偎在一起.

sentences.en: Snuggle up on the couch under a quilt and hot chocolate and read to him.
sentences.cn: 依偎在沙发上,盖着被子,喝着热巧克力,给他读书听.

sentences.en: Snuggle up to me and I'll keep you warm.
sentences.cn: 紧偎着我,我会使你暖和的.

sentences.en: When you say disco music is delightful, I snuggle up and listen.
sentences.cn: 你说迪斯科音乐好听, 我也凑上来听听.

words.tran_cn: 舒适地；隐蔽地；贴身地；紧密地
温暖舒适的地方，舒适的家

trans.tran_en: to settle into a warm comfortable position

trans.tran_cn: 依偎，舒适地蜷伏，紧靠，拥抱
